translated: not entangled in slander.ğŸ”½Not envious, not domineering,
not attached to gain;
Gentle and eloquent,
he is not faithless, not dispassionate.
Not training out of desire for gain,
not angry at lack of gain;
Not opposing craving,
he does not pursue tastes.
Always equanimous, mindful,
he does not consider the world equal to himself;
He is not contemptible or low,
he has no arrogance.
He who has no dependence,
knowing the Dhamma, independent;
For the sake of existence or non-existence,
for whom craving does not exist.
